dmca.title: [ABUSE] cease and desist
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 22, 2005 10:32 AM
To: ian@fwaonlineplus.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] cease and desist]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] cease and desist
Date: Tue, 22 Mar 2005 12:14:57 -0000
From: FWA Online Plus <ian@fwaonlineplus.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
CC: abuse@servermatrix.com

It has come to our attention that your servers are being used to distribute
Frontier Wrestling Limited's copyrighted content illegally.
Demand is hereby made that you cease and desist your illegal conduct.


The FWA pro wrestling TV show is being used unlawfully.
Below is a partial list of some of the pages which have infringed materials
on them.
globalwebforumservices.info
http://globalwebforumservices.info/stylesclash/
http://scmedia.globalwebforumservices.info/ajpiles/skaterkee/fwa.tv.18.03.05
-skaterkee.wmv

An attempt to hide this content has been made, using '
www.stylesclash.tk' as a password for this file. This password is
distributed on your servers via forums and also hotlinked from others.


Frontier Wrestling Limited is the lawful owner of the copyrighted materials
you have posted, and the wilful infringement of these materials is a
criminal act. Wilful infringement also subjects you to statutory damages of
up to
